alert.note: Alert for Bates (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 7:08PM CDT until July 01 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Bates County in west central Missouri... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 708 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hume, or 8 miles northwest of Rich Hill, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Butler, Amoret, Foster and Worland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
